summaries:
Here is the summary of the lesson:

- Lesson: Applications, Advantages and Disadvantages of Queue
• **Queue Operations**: A queue has primary operations (enqueue, dequeue) that take constant time O(1), as well as auxiliary operations (front, rear, isEmpty, size) that also have a time complexity of O(1).
• **Types of Queues**: There are three main types of queues: Simple Queue, Circular Queue, and Priority Queue. Each has its own characteristics and use cases.
• **Advantages and Disadvantages**: The advantages of using a queue include efficient management of large amounts of data, fast insertion and deletion operations, and suitability for multi-threading and shared resources. However, the disadvantages include time-consuming middle element operations, limited flexibility in insertion and deletion, and high search complexity.
